title: I cant connect to login queue... Only OCE?
body: Unlike the others, im on Vista, so its not my windows version thats the problem. I had recentlly started to reinstall League, and it worked fine while i was installing the game. But when i tried to login today, it came up with the login queue error. How can i fix this?

replies.body: A lot of OCE players were impacted, but also a lot of players routing near the west coast.  Good news is that everything should be okay now!
